description: List invoice revisionizing work items with pagination.
permissions: Admin users can list all invoice revisionizing works. Non-admin users can list only works for brokers they are a member of; visibility is limited to broker IDs returned by the policy scope.
validation_notes: organization-type must be one of Broker, Trucker, Customer. Organization filter is applied only when both organization-type and organization-id are provided.

flags.name: --created-by
flags.description: Filter by creator user ID. Example: --created-by 789.

flags.name: --organization-type
flags.description: Filter by organization type. Example: --organization-type Broker --organization-id 456.

flags.name: --organization-id
flags.description: Filter by organization ID. Example: --organization-type Broker --organization-id 456.

flags.name: --jid
flags.description: Filter by background job ID. Example: --jid 12345.
